response: Question successfully removed from position **{{position}}**. To see the new questions list, use the **/questions** command.
response_invalid_index_type: The question argument must be a valid number, referring to the index of the question to remove (starting from 0).
response_invalid_index:
The question argument must refer to a valid question, starting at index 0.
For example, 0 means the first question, 1 means the second question. To add a question as the first question, use -1 as the index.
Note: It is recommended just to use discord autocomplete for the index argument rather than manually inputting a number.
